001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageType;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
013import java.util.ArrayDeque;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Deque;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018
019/**
020 * Reconstructs TN3270 Telnet records into high-level message events.
021 * <p>Handles host-first message ordering and Telnet negotiations. Not thread-safe.</p>
022 *
023 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
024 */
025public final class Tn3270MessageReconstructor implements MessageReconstructor {
026  private final ClockPort clock;
027  private final Tn3270Metrics metrics;
028
029  private DirectionState client;
030  private DirectionState server;
031  private final Deque<String> pendingTransactionIds = new ArrayDeque<>();
032
033  /**
034   * Creates a reconstructor bound to the supplied clock and metrics sink.
035   *
036   * @param clock clock used for timestamping generated events
037   * @param metrics metrics sink used to record TN3270 reconstruction statistics
038   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code clock} or {@code metrics} is {@code null}
039   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
040   */
041  public Tn3270MessageReconstructor(ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
042    this.clock = clock;
043    this.metrics = new Tn3270Metrics(metrics);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Initializes per-direction decoders and clears pending transactions.
048   *
049   * @implNote Resets Telnet decoders for client and server directions.
050   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
051   */
052  @Override
053  public void onStart() {
054    client = new DirectionState(true);
055    server = new DirectionState(false);
056    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Decodes incoming bytes into Telnet records and produces TN3270 message events.
061   *
062   * @param slice contiguous TCP bytes with orientation metadata; must not be {@code null}
063   * @return ordered list of reconstructed TN3270 messages; may be empty
064   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code slice} is {@code null}
065   * @implNote Splits Telnet records on IAC EOR boundaries and manages host-first transaction ids.
066   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
067   */
068  @Override
069  public List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) {
070    metrics.onBytes(slice.data().length);
071    DirectionState dir = slice.fromClient() ? client : server;
072
073    List<byte[]> records = dir.feed(slice.data(), 0, slice.data().length);
074    List<MessageEvent> events = new ArrayList<>(records.size());
075    for (byte[] record : records) {
076      boolean fromClient = slice.fromClient();
077      MessageType type = fromClient ? MessageType.REQUEST : MessageType.RESPONSE;
078      String transactionId;
079      if (!fromClient) {
080        transactionId = TransactionId.newId();
081        pendingTransactionIds.addLast(transactionId);
082      } else {
083        transactionId = pendingTransactionIds.isEmpty()
084            ? TransactionId.newId()
085            : pendingTransactionIds.removeFirst();
086      }
087      ByteStream stream = new ByteStream(slice.flow(), fromClient, record, slice.timestampMicros());
088      MessageMetadata metadata = new MessageMetadata(transactionId, Map.of());
089      events.add(new MessageEvent(ProtocolId.TN3270, type, stream, metadata));
090    }
091    return events;
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Releases buffered state and clears pending transaction ids.
096   *
097   * @implNote Flushes Telnet decoder buffers to avoid cross-session leakage.
098   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
099   */
100  @Override
101  public void onClose() {
102    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
103    client.reset();
104    server.reset();
105  }
106
107  private static final class DirectionState {
108    private final boolean fromClient;
109    private final TelnetRecordDecoder decoder = new TelnetRecordDecoder();
110
111    DirectionState(boolean fromClient) {
112      this.fromClient = fromClient;
113    }
114
115    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
116      return decoder.feed(data, off, len);
117    }
118
119    void reset() {
120      decoder.reset();
121    }
122  }
123
124  private static final class TelnetRecordDecoder {
125    private static final int IAC = 0xFF;
126    private static final int SB = 0xFA;
127    private static final int SE = 0xF0;
128    private static final int EOR = 0xEF;
129    private static final int WILL = 0xFB;
130    private static final int WONT = 0xFC;
131    private static final int DO = 0xFD;
132    private static final int DONT = 0xFE;
133
134    private final ByteRing record = new ByteRing(1024);
135    private boolean pendingIac = false;
136    private boolean inSubneg = false;
137    private int awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
138
139    List<byte[]> feed(byte[] data, int off, int len) {
140      List<byte[]> out = null;
141      for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
142        int b = data[off + i] & 0xFF;
143        if (awaitingOptionCmd != 0) {
144          awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
145          continue;
146        }
147        if (!pendingIac) {
148          if (b == IAC) {
149            pendingIac = true;
150            continue;
151          }
152          if (!inSubneg) {
153            record.write((byte) b);
154          }
155          continue;
156        }
157        pendingIac = false;
158        switch (b) {
159          case IAC -> record.write((byte) IAC);
160          case SB -> inSubneg = true;
161          case SE -> inSubneg = false;
162          case WILL, WONT, DO, DONT -> awaitingOptionCmd = b;
163          case EOR -> {
164            if (!record.isEmpty()) {
165              if (out == null) out = new ArrayList<>();
166              out.add(record.take());
167            }
168          }
169          default -> { /* ignore */ }
170        }
171      }
172      return out == null ? List.of() : out;
173    }
174
175    void reset() {
176      record.clear();
177      pendingIac = false;
178      inSubneg = false;
179      awaitingOptionCmd = 0;
180    }
181
182    private static final class ByteRing {
183      private byte[] buf;
184      private int size;
185
186      ByteRing(int cap) {
187        buf = new byte[Math.max(256, cap)];
188        size = 0;
189      }
190
191      void write(byte b) {
192        ensureCapacity(1);
193        buf[size++] = b;
194      }
195
196      boolean isEmpty() {
197        return size == 0;
198      }
199
200      byte[] take() {
201        byte[] out = new byte[size];
202        System.arraycopy(buf, 0, out, 0, size);
203        size = 0;
204        return out;
205      }
206
207      void clear() {
208        size = 0;
209      }
210
211      private void ensureCapacity(int extra) {
212        int needed = size + extra;
213        if (needed <= buf.length) return;
214        int n = buf.length;
215        while (n < needed) n <<= 1;
216        byte[] nb = new byte[n];
217        System.arraycopy(buf, 0, nb, 0, size);
218        buf = nb;
219      }
220    }
221  }
222}
223
224
